The post caption: written in a mix of English and Tagalog, mentions the Taal volcano eruption and claims to show amazing shots during the eruption.
The first photo in the misleading post w: 3. A reverse image search on Google for one of the photos in the post revealed that it was taken by photographer Francisco Negroni during the 2015 eruption of the Calbuco volcano in Chile.
Philippine news organization Rappler fac: checked the same lightning storm photo and confirmed its authenticity.
